publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1467 Dennis Canavan: Victory for Graeme High School at Hampden Park-That the Parliament congratulates the boys of Graeme High School on their magnificent achievement of winning the "Coca-Cola 7's" and extends its congratulations to all the teams who participated in Scotland's largest schools football competition.

S2M-1467 Dennis Canavan: Victory for Graeme High School at Hampden Park-That the Parliament congratulates the boys of Graeme High School on their magnificent achievement of winning the "Coca-Cola 7's" and extends its congratulations to all the teams who participated in Scotland's largest schools football competition.
S2M-1467 Victory for Graeme High School at Hampden Park (lodged on 15 June 2004) Linda Fabiani*
S2M-1467 Victory for Graeme High School at Hampden Park (lodged on 15 June 2004) Donald Gorrie*
S2M-1467 Victory for Graeme High School at Hampden Park (lodged on 15 June 2004) Elaine Smith*
